alert.note: Alert for Bates; Cass; Henry; Johnson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 9:17AM CDT until July 24 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cass County in west central Missouri... Western Henry County in west central Missouri... Northern Bates County in west central Missouri... Southwestern Johnson County in west central Missouri... * Until 1000 AM CDT. * At 917 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Garden City, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clinton, Butler, Adrian, Garden City, Archie, Urich, Montrose, Creighton, Chilhowee, Gunn City, Blairstown, Passaic, La Tour, Ballard, Hartwell, La Due and Quick City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
